item.description:
The Natalie Turgeon band pairs up with the Tom Dixon band to rock The Yard for a benefit concert to help McKenzie Lowe, an 11 year old girl from Hudson, NH that has been diagnosed with an inoperable brain tumor. McKenzie has started treatments to help reduce the size of the tumor and funds are needed to cover the family's rising medical costs.
FAMILIES welcome !!

$15.00 donation fee for concert admittance
Doors open at 12:00pm

ALL proceeds go to digital credit union, Hudson, NH c/o Friends of McKenzie Lowe Acct. # 15025000

For more concert ticket information contact Robin Reis 603-490-9190
item.how_to_find_us: There will be a sign on a table near the bar
item.name: Country for McKenzie Benefit
